column4: I'm trying to re-install grub2 via the livecd (upgrade didn't go so well), wiki says to edit /etc/default/grub, but it's a blank file...
iirc grub2 uses a config file that you aren't supposed to manually edit... i might be wrong though
right, that's callled grub.cfg, which is different from /etc/default/grub
Yeah sounds about right, sorry to not been of more help.
